imdb.title: Starmyu
imdb.plot: Ayanagi Academy: home of musical dreams and insane competition. New student Yuta Hoshitani dreams of being in show business, but to get there he'll have to gain acceptance from the Kao Council (Cherry Blossom Flower Council), Ayan...

episodes.title: Act 1
episodes.plot: Yuta Hoshitani, a first year at Ayanagi Academy, finds out about auditions for the musical department and applies with his new friend, Nayuki.

episodes.title: Act 2
episodes.plot: Hoshitani made it onto a Star Team! But there's a big difference in skill between him and his teammates...

episodes.title: Act 3
episodes.plot: Hoshitani tries to befriend Tengenji, but he's met with some resistance. What's hiding behind Tengenji's tough exterior?

episodes.title: Act 4
episodes.plot: Tsukigami seems determined to act cool towards Hoshitani, but when a member of Team Hiragi picks a fight, what will Team Otori do?

episodes.title: Act 5
episodes.plot: The Newcomers' Debut Performance is coming up, and Team Otori is facing stiff competition from Team Hiragi.

episodes.title: Act 6
episodes.plot: It's finally time for the Newcomers' Debut Performance. Will Team Otori make it to the next round?

episodes.title: Act 7
episodes.plot: Team Otori goes to training camp over summer vacation to prepare for the Ayanagi Festival and meet... a bear?

episodes.title: Act 8
episodes.plot: It's almost time for the Ayanagi Festival! As Team Otori tries to decide what to perform, Kao Council members voice their complaints to Hiragi...

episodes.title: Act 9
episodes.plot: Team Otori's performance at the Ayanagi Festival is in jeopardy, and the truth behind Otori and Hiragi's past is revealed.

episodes.title: Act 10
episodes.plot: With Otori gone, Hoshitani and the others seem to be drifting apart. Can they regroup in time for the Ayanagi Festival?

episodes.title: Act 11
episodes.plot: Team Otori gets a special look at professionals at work when they're called out to help with a photoshoot.
